title: Home - MRJ Plumbing
content: MRJ Plumbing offers professional and friendly general plumbing and leak services. They provide plumbing maintenance, leak detection, and CCTV/water intrusion investigation services to residential and commercial sectors, including real estate agencies. Contact MRJ Plumbing today for a fast and free quote on your plumbing needs.
headings: Full service plumbing and leak detection

title: Hello world! - MRJ Plumbing
content: This page is a blog post titled "Hello world!" on a plumbing website. It welcomes visitors to WordPress and invites them to edit or delete the post and start writing.

title: CCTV and Water Intrusion - MRJ Plumbing
content: MRJ Plumbing specializes in CCTV and water intrusion services, offering inspections, diagnosis, and reports. They provide plumbing solutions for pre-purchase inspections, insurance reporting, real estate agents, stormwater drainage, and blocked drain diagnosis.
headings: PRE PURCHASE HOME, PLUMBING INSPECTION REPORT

title: Leak Detection - MRJ Plumbing
content: MRJ Plumbing specializes in leak detection and burst pipe services. They offer insurance reporting for water intrusions and use advanced technology like acoustic and thermal imaging cameras to locate and repair leaks in various areas, including underground pipes, mains water lines, roofs, apartments, and houses.

title: General Plumbing Services - MRJ Plumbing
content: MRJ Plumbing offers a range of plumbing services including bathroom, kitchen, and laundry renovations, toilet repair and replacement, leaking tap and shower head repairs, dishwasher plumbing and installation, fridge water points and plumbing, hot water systems, and rainwater tank installation. They also provide CCTV/water intrusion and leak detection services.
